name: grubdash
description: Full stack GrubDash application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && node src/server.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install:all && npm run build && cp -r frontend/build public
